title: I Play the Role of (Villain/Heroine) in a Japanese-style Otome Game - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Harem   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Shoujo Ai   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Character Growth   Female Protagonist   Folklore   Friendship   Genderless Protagonist   Humanoid Protagonist   Male to Female   Multiple POV   Multiple Protagonists   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Onmyouji   Otome Game   Possessive Characters   R-15   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reincarnated in Another World   Time Loop   Time Manipulation
author: Shippo Tanuki   しっぽタヌキ
description:
Transmigrating into the world of a supernatural otome game as a phantom. Unwillingly turning into the familiar of an onmyouji and becoming the villain who interferes with love. On the other hand, the heroine happily lived her life without knowing anything. As an ordinary girl who possesses just a little bit of a mysterious power.

… Until the final day, when that tiny body disappears.

The heroine holds the disappearing body in her arms, and makes a resolution.

―― I’ll take you back no matter what.

―― For that, I’ll repeat this no matter how many times it takes.>
